text: Even though it still feels like it â€™ s 30 degrees in many parts of the country, Kendall and Kylie Jenner just launched their second swimwear collection with online retailer Revolve to give you hope that summer will eventually get here one day ( promise ). While Kendall and Kylie both appeared in the ad campaign for their first swimwear collection with Revolve in 2017, this time around Kendall is the only one to make an appearance, showing off her abs in a red and white bikini. ( Kylie was probably too busy having a baby to make it to the photoshoot, TBH. ) Revolve SHOP NOW Classic Bikini Top, KENDALL + KYLIE X REVOLVE, $ 78 SHOP NOW Classic Bikini Bottom, KENDALL
